title: Google is testing a next-level search bar in the Pixel Launcher
content:
Pixel phones (and some Nexus devices before that) have a custom home screen app launcher developed by Google, though it’s not quite as feature-packed as some third-party launchers or home screens from other manufacturers. Thankfully, it looks like the Pixel Launcher could receive a helpful upgrade in the near future. Mishaal Rahman of Esper discovered

The post Google is testing a next-level search bar in the Pixel Launcher appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is working on an improved search bar for the Pixel Launcher, which combines results from the web, Google Photos, and other sources.
